info.title: Setu Insights API
info.description: Setuâ€™s Insights API gives you actionable insights from a customer's bank statement about their income, expenditure, and financial history.

post.description: Call this API with the data received from FIP's notification as payload, to create an FI DataBlock. Note: This data can be auto-fetched from FIP with FIU's consent.

schema.title: FI Data as defined by ReBIT schema

post.description: Call this API with the template-id received from Setu along with a list of data-ids, to trigger an Report generation job. The FI Datablocks can belong to multiple bank accounts.The created Report will be shared via a notification to the endpoint configured by the FIU.This API will respond with a report-id, which can also be used to fetch the generated Report.
